channel.title: Cant compile my server help!
channel.description: i keep getting an error for richscape compiler preparing for compile.... auto settings envirmental variables... scanning for latest jdk versions..... no version of jdk 1.6 was detected.

item.title: Cant compile my server help!
item.dc:creator: @Korkle777 Korkle777
item.description:
@Korkle777 wrote:

Right click your compiler and hit edit and replace it with this

echo off :menu cls title Client Tools by Galkon echo Client Tools echo. echo C - Compile client. echo R - Run client. echo CR - Compile, then run client immediately; be 100% sure of no errors! echo E - Exit. echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==c goto compile if %option%==C goto compile if %option%==R goto run if %option%==r goto run if %option%==rc goto CR if %option%==RC goto CR if %option%==rC goto CR if %option%==Rc goto CR if %option%==cr goto CR if %option%==CR goto CR if %option%==cR goto CR if %option%==Cr goto CR if %option%==e goto exit if %option%==E goto exit if %option%==* goto error goto error :compile title Compiler cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_0#\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause goto menu :run cls title Run java -Xmx300m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32 cls pause :CR title Compile-Run cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_0#\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java title Run java -Xmx300m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32 cls pause :exit cls exit :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type in are correct. pause cls goto menu

Look though this and replace the # with the version of the update you have of jdk.
Like, if you have JDK 1.6.0_06. Replace the # with a 6
If you don’t know what JDk you have, try this
Open My computer>C: Drive>Program Files>Java
Then read what the folder says for JDK whatever version

Read full topic
